text: obage bharyayavangen kavurun ho obagen ven vi pratiksepa karannan veta gos (æyata viyadam kala vastuva ovun vetin nolæbi) tibiyadi e venuven (ovunge visvasaya tæbu bharyayavan venuven laba diya yutu dæyen) kisivak oba navatagena sitiyahot (nætahot pratiksepa karannan samaga yuddhayak æti vi ovunge vastuva oba at kara gatta vuvada), eyin (obagen) kavurunge bharyayavan pratiksepa karannan veta giyoda, ovun venuven (ovunge svamipurusayin) viyadam kala dæya men dæyak laba denu. oba (mema karanavehi) allahta biya vanu. (mandayat) ohuvama oba visvasa kara ættehuya
